skill.name: similarity-search-patterns
skill.description: Implement efficient similarity search with vector databases. Use when building semantic search, implementing nearest neighbor queries, or optimizing retrieval performance.
skill.summary: Implement efficient similarity search with vector databases. Use when building semantic search, impl...

security_audit.summary: No data theft or malicious execution patterns found. Content is instructional templates for vector search across common databases.

content.value_statement: Building fast semantic search is complex and error prone. This skill provides proven templates for common vector databases and hybrid retrieval.
actual_capabilities: Provide Pinecone vector store template with upsert, search, and rerank
Provide Qdrant vector store template with filters and hybrid search
Provide pgvector template with HNSW index and hybrid SQL query
Provide Weaviate template with vector and hybrid search flows
Outline index types and distance metrics selection
limitations: Does not generate embeddings or choose embedding models
Does not deploy or configure external database services
Does not provide performance benchmarks for your data
Does not manage authentication or secret storage

use_cases.title: Add vector search API
use_cases.description: Stand up a vector search layer with Pinecone, Qdrant, pgvector, or Weaviate.

use_cases.title: Scale retrieval indexing
use_cases.description: Select index types and parameters for large scale similarity search workloads.

use_cases.title: Improve RAG quality
use_cases.description: Implement hybrid search and reranking to improve relevance.

prompt_templates.title: Choose index type
prompt_templates.prompt: Recommend an index type for 5 million vectors with latency under 100 ms and explain the tradeoffs.

prompt_templates.title: Pinecone setup
prompt_templates.prompt: Draft a Pinecone vector store class with upsert and search methods and explain needed parameters.

prompt_templates.title: pgvector hybrid
prompt_templates.prompt: Show a pgvector hybrid search query combining vector similarity and full text, with weight control.

prompt_templates.title: Rerank results
prompt_templates.prompt: Add a reranking step using a cross encoder after vector search and explain the flow.

output_examples.input: Explain how to implement hybrid search with Qdrant
output: Use a dense vector query with an optional filter for metadata.
Add sparse or keyword signals by managing payload fields.
Balance relevance by tuning limit and score threshold.

best_practices: Measure recall and latency before tuning index parameters
Use hybrid search for better relevance on ambiguous queries
Batch upserts to reduce API overhead and cost
anti_patterns: Skipping evaluation and relying only on default parameters
Over indexing small datasets where flat search is sufficient
Ignoring metadata filters that reduce search space

faq.question: Which platforms can use this skill?
faq.answer: It is compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code workflows that support reading the templates.

faq.question: Are there limits on database size?
faq.answer: No limits are enforced here, but each backend has its own scaling constraints.

faq.question: Can I integrate with my existing API layer?
faq.answer: Yes, the templates are simple classes you can wrap with your API framework.

faq.question: Does this skill access my data?
faq.answer: No, it only provides patterns and does not read or transmit user data.

faq.question: What if searches are slow?
faq.answer: Review index type, tune search parameters, and add filters to reduce candidate sets.

faq.question: How does this compare to a full framework?
faq.answer: This is focused guidance and templates, not a complete application framework.
